sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import "./ResumeSection.css"; import "bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css"; const ResumeSection = () => { return (

Resume

{/* Company & Current Roles */}

Company: Adarsh Solutions Pvt Ltd, Bangalore

Position: Project Engineer

Period: August 2024 – Present

Current Roles and Responsibilities:
  • Prepare a valid Project Schedule using Primavera P6.
  • Planning, Scheduling, and Management of the work package.
  • Verify & update critical paths between task activities.
  • Prepare KPIs, S-Curves, Manpower, and Quantity Reports.
  • Material procurement weekly updates and client status calls.
  • Prepare and document Effort Estimation and QAG reports.
{/* Skills */}

Skills

Functional Skills:
  • Documentation & data management
  • Teamwork
  • Excel VBA automation
Management Skills:
  • Training & team development
  • Planning for OTD
  • Problem solving
Tools:

Primavera P6, MS Project Plan 3, Excel VBA, SAP, ECTR, Command Center, Solidworks, AutoCAD

{/* Current Project */}

Current Project

Project Name: BH F&PT Offshore Support

Client: Bakers Hughes, USA

Tools: Primavera P6 and MS Office

{/* Projects Handled with dropdown */}

Projects Handled

{/* Project 1 */}

Client: Bakers Hughes, USA

Tools: Primavera P6 and MS Office

Duration: March 2021 – August 2024

{/* Project 2 */}

Client: Bakers Hughes, USA

Tools: Primavera P6 and MS Office

Duration: March 2021 – August 2021

{/* Project 3 */}

Client: Bakers Hughes, USA

Tools: MS Project Plan 3 and MS Office

Duration: March 2022 – Dec 2023

); }; export default ResumeSection;
